00025 if (basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) == basename(__FILE__)) {
00026     include_once '../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 }
00028 
00029 // generate warning messages
00030 $warnings = array();
00031 // check GD extension
00032 if (!extension_loaded('gd')) {
00033     $warnings[] = __('<strong>PHP GD</strong> extension is not installed. Please install it or application won\'t be able to create image thumbnail and barcode.');
00034 } else {
00035     // check GD Freetype
00036     if (!function_exists('imagettftext')) {
00037         $warnings[] = __('<strong>Freetype</strong> support is not enabled in PHP GD extension. Rebuild PHP GD extension with Freetype support or application won\'t be able to create barcode.');
00038     }
00039 }
00040 // check for overdue
00041 $overdue_q = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(loan_id) FROM loan AS l WHERE (l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0 AND TO_DAYS(due_date) < TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')) GROUP BY member_id');
00042 $num_overdue = $overdue_q->num_rows;
00043 if ($num_overdue > 0) {
00044     $warnings[] = str_replace('{num_overdue}', $num_overdue, __('There is currently <strong>{num_overdue}</strong> library members having overdue. Please check at <b>Circulation</b> module at <b>Overdues</b> section for more detail')); //mfc
00045     $overdue_q->free_result();
00046 }
00047 // check if images dir is writable or not
00048 if (!is_writable(IMAGES_BASE_DIR) OR !is_writable(IMAGES_BASE_DIR.'barcodes') OR !is_writable(IMAGES_BASE_DIR.'persons') OR !is_writable(IMAGES_BASE_DIR.'docs')) {
00049     $warnings[] = __('<strong>Images</strong> directory and directories under it is not writable. Make sure it is writable by changing its permission or you won\'t be able to upload any images and create barcodes');
00050 }
00051 // check if file repository dir is writable or not
00052 if (!is_writable(REPO_BASE_DIR)) {
00053     $warnings[] = __('<strong>Repository</strong> directory is not writable. Make sure it is writable (and all directories under it) by changing its permission or you won\'t be able to upload any bibliographic attachments.');
00054 }
00055 // check if file upload dir is writable or not
00056 if (!is_writable(FILES_UPLOAD_DIR)) {
00057     $warnings[] = __('<strong>File upload</strong> directory is not writable. Make sure it is writable (and all directories under it) by changing its permission or you won\'t be able to upload any file, create report files and create database backups.');
00058 }
00059 // check mysqldump
00060 if (!file_exists($sysconf['mysqldump'])) {
00061     $warnings[] = __('The PATH for <strong>mysqldump</strong> program is not right! Please check configuration file or you won\'t be able to do any database backups.');
00062 }
00063 
00064 // if there any warnings
00065 if ($warnings) {
00066     echo '<div style="padding: 3px; border: 1px dotted #FF0000; background: #FFFFFF;">';
00067     echo '<ul>';
00068     foreach ($warnings as $warning_msg) {
00069         echo '<li style="color: #FF0000;">'.$warning_msg.'</li>';
00070     }
00071     echo '</ul>';
00072     echo '</div>';
00073 }
00074 
00075 // admin page content
00076 require LIB_DIR.'content.inc.php';
00077 $content = new content();
00078 $content_data = $content->get($dbs, 'adminhome');
00079 if ($content_data) {
00080     echo '<div class="contentDesc">'.$content_data['Content'].'</div>';
00081     unset($content_data);
00082 }
00083 ?>
